verses.verse: Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> not, <S%H408><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for <S%H413><s%> joy, <S%H1524><s%> as other people: <S%H5971><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou hast gone a whoring <S%H2181><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> thou hast loved <S%H157><s%> a reward <S%H868><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> corn <S%H1715><s%> floor. <S%H1637><s%>
The floor <S%H1637><s%> and the winepress <S%H3342><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> them, and the new wine <S%H8492><s%> shall fail <S%H3584><s%> in her.

They shall not <S%H3808><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> but Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and they shall eat <S%H398><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> things in Assyria. <S%H804><s%>

They shall not <S%H3808><s%> offer <S%H5258><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> offerings to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they be pleasing <S%H6149><s%> unto him: their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> shall be unto them as the bread <S%H3899><s%> of mourners; <S%H205><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that eat <S%H398><s%> thereof shall be polluted: <S%H2930><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> their bread <S%H3899><s%> for their soul <S%H5315><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> come into <S%H935><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> will ye do <S%H6213><s%> in the solemn <S%H4150><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the feast <S%H2282><s%> of the LORD? <S%H3068><s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> lo, <S%H2009><s%> they are gone <S%H1980><s%> because of destruction: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7701><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall gather them up, <S%H6908><s%> Memphis <S%H4644><s%> shall bury <S%H6912><s%> them: the pleasant <S%H4261><s%> places for their silver, <S%H3701><s%> nettles <S%H7057><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> them: thorns <S%H2336><s%> shall be in their tabernacles. <S%H168><s%>

The days <S%H3117><s%> of visitation <S%H6486><s%> are come, <S%H935><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of recompense <S%H7966><s%> are come; <S%H935><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> it: the prophet <S%H5030><s%> is a fool, <S%H191><s%> the spiritual <S%H7307><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is mad, <S%H7696><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of thine iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and the great <S%H7227><s%> hatred. <S%H4895><s%>

The watchman <S%H6822><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> was with <S%H5973><s%> my God: <S%H430><s%> but the prophet <S%H5030><s%> is a snare <S%H6341><s%> of a fowler <S%H3352><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and hatred <S%H4895><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his God. <S%H430><s%>

They have deeply <S%H6009><s%> corrupted <S%H7843><s%> themselves, as in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Gibeah: <S%H1390><s%> therefore he will remember <S%H2142><s%> their iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> he will visit <S%H6485><s%> their sins. <S%H2403><s%>

I found <S%H4672><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> like grapes <S%H6025><s%> in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> as the firstripe <S%H1063><s%> in the fig tree <S%H8384><s%> at her first time: <S%H7225><s%> but they <S%H1992><s%> went <S%H935><s%> to Baal-peor, <S%H1187><s%> and separated themselves <S%H5144><s%> unto that shame; <S%H1322><s%> and their abominations <S%H8251><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> according as they loved. <S%H157><s%>

As for Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> their glory <S%H3519><s%> shall fly away <S%H5774><s%> like a bird, <S%H5775><s%> from the birth, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3205><s%> and from the womb, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H990><s%> and from the conception. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2032><s%>

Though <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> they bring up <S%H1431><s%> <S%H853><s%> their children, <S%H1121><s%> yet will I bereave <S%H7921><s%> them, that there shall not be a man <S%H4480><s%> <S%H120><s%> left: yea, <S%H3588><s%> woe <S%H188><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> to them when I depart <S%H5493><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> them!

Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> Tyrus, <S%H6865><s%> is planted <S%H8362><s%> in a pleasant place: <S%H5116><s%> but Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> his children <S%H1121><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the murderer. <S%H2026><s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> them, O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> wilt thou give? <S%H5414><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> them a miscarrying <S%H7921><s%> womb <S%H7358><s%> and dry <S%H6784><s%> breasts. <S%H7699><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is in Gilgal: <S%H1537><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> I hated <S%H8130><s%> them: for <S%H5921><s%> the wickedness <S%H7455><s%> of their doings <S%H4611><s%> I will drive them out <S%H1644><s%> of mine house, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> I will love <S%H157><s%> them no <S%H3808><s%> more: <S%H3254><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their princes <S%H8269><s%> are revolters. <S%H5637><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is smitten, <S%H5221><s%> their root <S%H8328><s%> is dried up, <S%H3001><s%> they shall bear <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H1077><s%> fruit: <S%H6529><s%> yea, <S%H1571><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they bring forth, <S%H3205><s%> yet will I slay <S%H4191><s%> even the beloved <S%H4261><s%> fruit of their womb. <S%H990><s%>

My God <S%H430><s%> will cast them away, <S%H3988><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they did not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto him: and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> wanderers <S%H5074><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
